channel.title: CVE Feed for Philips -- Philips IntelliSpace Portal
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Philips -- Philips IntelliSpace Portal

item.title: CVE-2018-5464|2024-08-05T05:33:44.479Z -- philips -- philips%20intellispace%20portal
item.description: Philips IntelliSpace Portal all versions of 8.0.x, and 7.0.x have an untrusted SSL certificate vulnerability this could allow an attacker to gain unauthorized access to resources and information.

item.title: CVE-2018-5466|2024-08-05T05:33:44.468Z -- philips -- philips%20intellispace%20portal
item.description: Philips IntelliSpace Portal all versions of 8.0.x, and 7.0.x have a self-signed SSL certificate vulnerability this could allow an attacker to gain unauthorized access to resources and information.

item.title: CVE-2018-5454|2024-08-05T05:33:44.323Z -- philips -- philips%20intellispace%20portal
item.description: Philips IntelliSpace Portal all versions of 8.0.x, and 7.0.x have a vulnerability where code debugging methods are enabled, which could allow an attacker to remotely execute arbitrary code during runtime.

item.title: CVE-2018-5468|2024-08-05T05:33:44.423Z -- philips -- philips%20intellispace%20portal
item.description: Philips Intellispace Portal all versions 7.0.x and 8.0.x have a remote desktop access vulnerability that could allow an attacker to gain unauthorized access and in some cases escalate their level of privilege or execute arbitrary code

item.title: CVE-2018-5474|2024-08-05T05:40:49.789Z -- philips -- philips%20intellispace%20portal
item.description: Philips Intellispace Portal all versions 7.0.x and 8.0.x have an input validation vulnerability that could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code or cause the application to crash.

item.title: CVE-2018-5462|2024-08-05T05:33:44.384Z -- philips -- philips%20intellispace%20portal
item.description: Philips IntelliSpace Portal all versions of 8.0.x, and 7.0.x have an SSL incorrect hostname certificate vulnerability this could allow an attacker to gain unauthorized access to resources and information.

item.title: CVE-2018-5458|2024-08-05T05:33:44.341Z -- philips -- philips%20intellispace%20portal
item.description: Philips IntelliSpace Portal all versions of 8.0.x, and 7.0.x have a vulnerability using SSL legacy encryption that could allow an attacker to gain unauthorized access to resources and information.

item.title: CVE-2018-5470|2024-08-05T05:33:44.334Z -- philips -- philips%20intellispace%20portal
item.description: Philips IntelliSpace Portal all versions of 8.0.x, and 7.0.x have an unquoted search path or element vulnerability that has been identified, which may allow an authorized local user to execute arbitrary code and escalate their level of privileges.

item.title: CVE-2018-5472|2024-08-05T05:40:49.839Z -- philips -- philips%20intellispace%20portal
item.description: Philips Intellispace Portal all versions 7.0.x and 8.0.x have an insecure windows permissions vulnerability that could allow an attacker to gain unauthorized access and in some cases escalate their level of privilege or execute arbitrary code.
